website_summaries.verdict: Balancing style and comfort, the Lacoste Lerond Leather keeps things low-profile. It’s made up of high-quality materials and has a durable construction, offered at a budget-friendly price tag. However, a couple of issues were also found, involving the rather thin sole and the tight fit across the foot for some users. Overall, this model is ideal for those who are looking for an affordable and stylish casual pair of kicks for their daily wardrobe.
pros: The Lacoste Lerond Leather is fashionable, as praised by most reviewers
According to a lot of wearers, the shoe is comfortable
A few users attested that the Lacoste Lerond Leather is durable
Length-wise, the sneaker fits as expected, many buyers attested
Several testers observed that the shoe is made of great material and is of excellent quality
More than a handful of purchasers imparted that they would recommend the Lacoste Lerond Leather
cons: The sole is somewhat thin, complained a few reviewers
A couple of wearers detected that the sneaker feels tight across the foot

customer_reviews.title: Irritation resulting in injury and blood :-(
customer_reviews.text: Size seems fine but higher heel than a previous model (also Lacoste and very similar - though was getting the same one but was sent a different) which results in rubbed-irritation on the back of the leg - not very comfortable. Would go for a model with a lower heel to eliminate the potential issue. My son did not experience such issues with any other shoes before but I guess it is too late now to return them since he wore them? To clarify, yes, he wears proper socks, so it is not that - damages the skin through the sock, so it is pretty bad.
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: I bought these for my husband. A bit confusing ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband. A bit confusing as they say they are Ladies but they definitely are not. He really likes them and they fit well.
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent product, arrived in excellent condition, looks very nice, my partner loves them.
customer_reviews.author: art86ify

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Hands down now my most comfortable shoes. Annoyingly find myself wearing them constantly. I forget I have other shoes.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: LOOK GOOD & COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: Well made to expected standard for shoe type. Attractive colour. Delivered on time & fair price if supplied at the Amazon discounted rate.
customer_reviews.author: dynamo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are NOT Women’s they ARE Men’s and great price
customer_reviews.author: Mr L.

customer_reviews.title: Fine for gents too
customer_reviews.text: Bought for me (fella with wide feet) - didn’t spot it was the women’s version... nice shoes though - happy with them
customer_reviews.author: Matt Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable - great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love these trainers- they’re very comfortable and lightweight. Great buy! Very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke them in, in about half hour, and ...
customer_reviews.text: Broke them in , in about half hour, and they still looked fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality soft comfortable
customer_reviews.text: excellent quality soft comfortable. Insole 6UK= 25 cm Size 39 = Rus. five plus. delivery to Russia 12 days.

product_meta.title: Lacoste Women's Lerond Bl 1 Cam Low
product_meta.description: The Lacoste men’s Espere sneaker is a refined, slim line silhouette, with uppers crafted from high quality nappa leather. It has supple cushioning at the heel and a vulcanised outsole ensure enhanced comfort. This shoe evokes Lacoste's tennis heritage and will look elegant paired with rolled denim and a striped T-shirt.
